  • Create Client from profile
  • View page source

Create Client from profileÔÉÅ

  1. First we need to create a profile:

    1. (OPTIONAL) Create a directory where you want to store your profiles, in this case we will call it ./my_profiles

    2. Create a file, in this case we will call it profiles.ini (./my_profiles/profiles.ini)

    3. Inside the file we add the following parameters to create a profile named my_profile:

      [my_profile]
url = https://url_mlmodelmanager
token = my_tokehn
auth_type = standalone
download_path = /home/user/models

      Note

      auth_type and download_path are not required

  2. Connect to the client using a token

    >>> from devo_ml.modelmanager import create_client_from_profile


>>> client = create_client_from_profile("my_profile", "./my_profiles/profiles.ini")
>>> model = client.get_model("my_model")
>>> model
{
   'id': 1,
   'name': 'my_model',
   'engine': 'H2O',
   'description': 'This is the model description of my_model',
   ...
}
